name: KOFTA AUR AALU KA SALAN Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for KOFTA AUR AALU KA SALAN Recipe: Mince ½ kg Tikka seekh masala 2 tbsp Roasted gram flour 2 tbsp heaped Coriander leaves chopped ½ bunch Ginger garlic 1 tbsp Turmeric ¼ tsp Salt 1tsp Chili powder 1tsp 2 tbsp yogurt All spice ½ tsp 1 bread slice chopperised Ingredients for Gravy Tomatoes 5 Brown onion 5 tbsp Yogurt ½ cup Chili powder 2 tsp Salt 1 tsp Ginger garlic 1 tbsp Cumin roasted and crushed 1 tsp Coriander powder 1 tsp All spice 1 tsp Coriander leaves 2 tbsp Oil ½ cup
instructions: Mix all the given ingredients in mince and chopperize well, make into balls shallow fry in oil for 5 mins keep aside. METHOD FOR GRAVY Heat oil add ginger garlic with all the dry masala with blended tomatoes grinded brown onion, yogurt fry well adding little little water put fried koftas cook for 10 mins add 1 cup water cook till gravy thick lastly add chopped coriander leaves and serve.
